name: Mystical Kumano Kodo Trail
summary: Explore the  Mystical Kumano Kodo Trail in rural Japan
description: Journey through the Kansai region of Japan on a 6-day adventure. Immerse yourself in the rich history and spirituality of the area as you stay in traditional ryokans or minshukus. Walk ancient 1000-year-old trails, uncovering rural villages, sacred temples, and rejuvenating hot springs along the way.

name: Enchanting Cotswolds Trail
summary: Wander the Quintessentially English Cotswolds Trail
description: Discover the enchanting beauty of the Cotswolds. Embark on a 5-day walk through the idyllic Cotswolds region in Gloucester, England. Immerse yourself in quintessentially English country inns, explore ancient commons, and meander through honey-colored villages.

name: Colorful Madeira Island
summary: Walk through Colorful Madeira Island in Portugal's charming archipelago
description: Take a wonderful timeout  in the picturesque Madeira Archipelago, Portugal. Enjoy comfortable stays in 4-star hotels or charming manor houses. Explore the flower-filled landscapes of Madeira on foot, and take a dip in the natural pools created by volcanic lava formations. Experience the vibrant colors and beauty of Madeira Island while walking through its enchanting scenery.
